pageTitle: Wagons Learning IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Details
pageHeading: Wagons Learning Limited IPO (Wagons Learning IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 1600 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Uday Jagannath Shetty and Raviraj Poojary are the promoters of the company.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Wagons Learning Limited is engaged in providing corporate training, digital learning, and skill development solutions. The company operates on a B2B model, offering services such as training and certifications, digital learning (LMS/LXP), skill development, trainer outsourcing, and payroll management.

Key Service Verticals:

  1. Corporate Learning & Development
  2. Digital Learning Solutions (LMS, LXP, Content Development, Digital Library)
  3. Skill Development & CSR Implementation
  4. Trainer Outsourcing & Payroll Management

Wagons Learning specialises in sales training, customer service, soft skills, behavioural, functional, and knowledge-based training across industries like automotive, banking and financial services, pharma, and healthcare. The company is NSDC-certified under the Skill Sathi program (valid till January 4, 2027) and has trained over 500,000 professionals through classroom, virtual, and digital modules.

Wagons Learning serves clients across India and has expanded internationally with a branch office in Dubai, UAE, offering education technology solutions, digital libraries, government project execution, and content development. The company is also entering the B2C space by launching industry-ready certification courses.

As of June 30, 2024, the company employs 77 full-time staff.

Competitive Strengths:

  • PAN India location reaches across tier 1, 2, 3, and 4 cities.
  • In-house domain experts, experienced retainership trainers and empanelled trainers.
  • In-house Subject Matter Experts (SME) & Instructional Designers (ID) for content development.
  • SMEs & content team follow the 3D Model.
  • Customised large-scale interventions in 19 regional languages.

contactDetails.full_address: Wagons Learning Limited, Office No. 302 Tower 2, Montreal Business Center, Pallod Farms Baner

faqs.question: What is the Wagons Learning IPO?
faqs.answer:
Wagons Learning IPO is a SME IPO of 4680000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹38.38 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 to ₹82 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 2, 2025, and closes on May 6, 2025.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Wagons Learning IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Wagons Learning IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Wagons Learning IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Wagons Learning IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Wagons Learning IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Wagons Learning IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Wagons Learning IPO opens on May 2, 2025 and closes on May 6, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Wagons Learning IPO?
faqs.answer: Wagons Learning IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,31,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Wagons Learning IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Wagons Learning IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Wagons Learning IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Wagons Learning IPO will be done on Wednesday, May 7, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, May 8, 2025. Check the Wagons Learning IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Wagons Learning IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Wagons Learning IPO listing date is not yet announced. The tentative date of Wagons Learning IPO listing is Friday, May 9, 2025.

reservation.summary: Wagons Learning IPO offers total 4680000 shares. Out of which 532800 (11.38%) allocated to QIB 1689600 (36.10%) allocated to NII 2222400 (47.49%) allocated to RII.
